custom-action.name: Close GuiMainWindow (Create Sales Order: Initial Screen)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates a close action on an SAP window or an SAP dialog.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/wnd[0]/". - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
